title: Who is the most popular in Black Pink? - Quora

response.answer_text: UPDATED! Information are based on depth evidences or proofs. Minor achievements for individual artists that could not create the bigger picture or have less impact are not included. Based on general observation without bias thing involve, the most popular member is LALISA MANOBAN. There are many reasons why. First and foremost, many YG fans have waited for the new girl group from YG entertainment to debut. LISA was revealed with the dance video, doing b-boying moves with tumbling and split as well as NONAGON brand that showcased her swag, badass, and cool aura. The pre-debut dance practice video showed her amazing dancing skills with her blond hair that can really identify her from the rest. Her foreign features as Thai attract people to like her in their various MVs. We cannot deny that because the first impression matters. She shines from the other members. Her rap parts amazed many people as she added swag and badass vibes in the delivery with her dance moves. In live performances, Lisa has outstanding stage presence and charisma as the main dancer. She has this formula quoted by her fans in performing = swag charisma+ powerful and sharp moves + hiphop vibe + facial expression + stage presence + confidence + consistency.. Lisa is also a sub-vocalist that is why she sounds pleasing in her singing lines as commended by many BLINKS. Off stage, she is totally a different person with her dork and shameless personality, full of aegyos that amazed many people, her reverse charm. MORE PROOFS: Here are additional information that LALISA MANOBAN is the most popular member : If people insist on IG thing, Lisa had the longest hanged up on her IG for 9 hrs. and beyond compared to other members. She was left with 154k plus followers, while other members were heading to 500k. Her fans could not follow her and even had lost accounts in the followers’ list. Despite that, she managed to rise up day by day. From the lowest followers to the highest one, Lisa with 5, 451, 813 (July 26, 2018), Jennie has 5, 441, 391, Rose has 4, 726, 653, and Jisoo with 4, 712, 305. LISA also breaking records in IG as the the fastest girl group member who has reached 2M plus likes in 2 days for 3 various posts and second to Taeyeon in having 2M plus likes in IG. She has now 8 posts with 2M plus likes, the highest among girl artist. She is known as the QUEEN of SOLD OUTS for all the products she is in: Nonagon, Nylon magazine, Japan Magazine, and Moonshot. She is called by the Chinese community as QUEEN of WEIBO since Weibo is the alternate social media site in China. Lisa has 11 billboards viewed for more than 1 minute in her birthdays after debut at New York Time Square. Each billboard is worth 15,000 US dollars. Rose and Jennie have 2 billboards each for their bdays as well in different locations. LisaChinaBar is the biggest fan base in China that bought 4000 albums for Blackpink’s “Square Up.” In Billboard updates, Lisa’s name trends, the only member’s name, for the most searched items alongside with “DDU-DU-DDU-DU, BLACKPINK, PRETTY, and others” in South Korea. Second is JENNIE KIM. The three members can be identified separately from each other as you watch more than once their MVs. Jennie is the main rapper and vocalist: trained longer than the other member (a month ahead to Lisa). She participated in G-Dragon’s music. She is also cool and sexy in their various MVs. Her eyes make her appearance so powerful and strong on and off stage. Her rapping skill is undeniably awesome! She has Chanel international brand promotion that showcases her charisma. Indeed Jennie is charismatic as she put herself in fashion and performance. Recently, Jennie participated in Running Man show that has proven her popularity in South Korea as she trends in Naver during the show. BRAND REPUTATION INDEX for the month of JULY was released and Jennie ranked no. 1. She even trended in Daum Entertainment during the Sprite show. Her image was well-established in South Korea. Third is ROSE or PARK CHAEYOUNG. She is the lead vocalist in the group. Has unique voice quality. This makes her the main vocalist.She looks soft, but truly talented as she knows how to string guitar and play piano. She was a cheer dancer before. With the help of Lisa, she improves her dancing skills as she testified in one of their interviews. This makes her the lead dancer. Together with Jisoo, she makes the balance of black and pink in BP. Rose performed in various shows year 2017 which are The King of Masked, Fantastic Duo, and Radio Star. She had collaborations with some artists in the Kpop industry during awards shows. With these, she gained fans, because of being a talented singer. Recently, Rose trended in Naver at South Korea during Sprite show. RoseChinaBar has mini posters in hallways as promotion for Rose in their latest debut. Last but not the least is KIM JISOO. This cute member is well-known in South Korea compared to other members. She is the visual as observed with her glamorous beauty. She is the lead vocalist as well that is why her deep and high voice in her singing lines attract people. Jisoo is well-versed as she is an actress in TV dramas and emcee in awarding shows. She attended the Unexpected Q show that made her to no. 7 in trending list. She even trended alongside with Jennie in Running Man show. In the BRAND REPUTATION INDEX for the month of JULY in South Korea, she ranked no. 7. More proofs: JAPAN released their popularity index where Lisa has 9.5 to 10M, Jisoo with 5M, Jennie with 3M, and Rose with 2.5M. All in all, the four of them are talented and charismatic in their own advantages! This group cannot be BLACKPINK if one is missing. This comment just stated the arrangement of popularity line, but it does not mean one is degraded than the other. No! Popularity does not equate to hate, but rather support to reality because these four move as one in their present career. There are many proofs in this order: Lisa, Jennie, Rose, and Jisoo. If you want to know more, better research and observe OBJECTIVELY. Thanks.

Probably Lisa. Here’s the thing about Blackpink, unlike most groups, each member “has their own style”. I don’ think I remember the source, but I read somewhere on Instagram that YG wants each member to dress in a certain style. Lisa, for instant, her outfits are exotic, and that’s exactly YG’s intention. Aside from that, you should consider their face as another important factor. Now I’m not comparing them or commenting on their appearances. When stanning Blackpink, Blinks usually find their own bias. They find the most appealing face to stan (don’t get me wrong, I’m just generalising what fans usually do). Yet don’t forget about personality. Of course the most hilarious and cute member is more well-liked not only by fans but also by other artists and the netizens. Talents is the last factor, and the vital factor which makes Blackpink one of the most highest-rated girl groups out there. Sometimes, fans stan a member just because of their undeniable talent. So, to answer your question, I’d say the most commonly liked Blackpink member is Lisa. Here’s my personal opinion: Jisoo is the the most mature, the visual, good at singing, even though she is very popular in Korea but she doesn’t seem to have as many International fans (Jisoo is the only member who cannot speak fluent English). Rose has a unique voice, however, she has more people stanning her in countries in Europe or North-South America because fans seem to adore her goddess aura. Jennie is popular in and out of Korea, the group’s rapper and dancer. Jennie sings beautifully, but to be honest, she has a quiet character. Lisa, she is the dancer and rapper, wears exotic clothes, and has an outgoing character. Not to mention the fact that Lisa has tons of Thai fans. Whenever I ask someone which member they like best, most of the time they would say Lisa. (I stan Jisoo) Again, this is 90% based on my observations. I’m a Blink so there’s no reason to aggravate my favorite group’s reputation. Hope this helps.
